title: inrae-project-website
text:
Éditeur(s) du site
INRAE - Institut national de recherche pour l’agriculture, l’alimentation et l’environnement INRAE est un établissement public à caractère scientifique et technologique. Il a son siège au 147, rue de l’université – 75338 Paris cedex 07. Ses statuts sont publiés dans le code rural et de la pêche maritime (articles R831-1 et suivants).
Il est représenté par son Président Directeur général, M. Philippe MAUGUIN. Contact mail: web@inrae.fr - contact téléphonique: 01 42 75 90 00

title: inrae-project-website
text:
Logo

Institut’s logo and Laboratory’s logo
The institute and laboratory logos must be placed in the image directory, and the path must be entered in the _quarto.yml file. The institute logo is a hyperlink. When we click on it, the institute web page opens.


Project’s logo
If you have a project’s logo, insert the image file (.png or .jpg) in the image directory. If you don’t have a project’s logo, simply comment out the margin-header part in YAML (Ctrl+C).

title: inrae-project-website
text:
Insert bibliography
Bibliography citations are inserted using a bibliography in bibtex format. We need to amend the bibliography.bib file in bibtex format to cite the references in our page, using [@reference] .
Example : Use package InraeTheme (Carayon and Boutry 2024)

title: inrae-project-website
text:
Creating web pages
In the terminal, we send the following commands to generate web pages.
quarto render

title: inrae-project-website
text:
This web page uses the HAL API to retrieve the project’s bibliographic references. To do this, you need to fill in the following two parameters (hal_project_name and hal_collection) in the YAML. For this request to be successful, it is important to fill in the ‘Collaboration/Project’ field when submitting to HAL with the project acronym, which will be identical to hal_project_name. The choice of limiting references linked to the project to a target collection. The creation of an API_HAL_project.bib file fills in all the references linked to the hal_project_name, limited by the hal_collection field.
In the following example, the parameters used in the YML are

title: inrae-project-website
text:
List of publications (based on HAL-INRAE)


Bertrin, Vincent. 2020. “Impacts des changements globaux sur les ressources en eau et les milieux aquatiques.” In Journées Information Eaux 2020. Poitiers, France: APTEN. https://hal.inrae.fr/hal-03052703.


Bertrin, Vincent, Sébastien Boutry, Aurélien Jamoneau, Gwilherm Jan, Sylvia Moreira, and Cristina Ribaudo. 2021. “L’eau : un exemple de contribution scientifique alimentant la prise de décision et l’évaluation - Les communautés végétales aquatiques.” In Les grandes rencontres du Parc naturel régional Médoc. Carcans, France. https://hal.inrae.fr/hal-04013933.


Chaumet, Betty, Nicolas Mazzella, Julie Neury-Ormanni, and Soizic Morin. 2020. “Light and temperature influence on diuron bioaccumulation and toxicity in biofilms.” Ecotoxicology 29: 185–95. https://doi.org/10.1007/s10646-020-02166-8.


Derot, J., Aurélien Jamoneau, Nils Teichert, Juliette Tison-Rosebery, Soizic Morin, and Christophe Laplace-Treyture. 2020. “Response of phytoplankton traits to environmental variables in French lakes: New perspectives for bioindication.” Ecological Indicators 108: 105659. https://doi.org/10.1016/j.ecolind.2019.105659.


Jamoneau, Aurélien, L. Bouraï, L. Devreux, L. Percaille, A. Queau, and Vincent Bertrin. 2018. “Les changements paysagers dans les bassins versants des lacs et étangs du littoral aquitain : Influence sur les communautés de macrophytes.” Journées techniques La chaîne des Lacs et étangs du littoral aquitain. Un territoire unique, l’implication de tous. https://hal.inrae.fr/hal-02608382.


Jamoneau, Aurélien, Sébastien Boutry, Jacky Vedrenne, Nicolas Mazzella, David Funosas-Planas, and Guillaume Bourguetou. 2019. “Dynamiques écologiques des lacs du littoral aquitain – physico-chimie du lac de Parentis-Biscarrosse.” Dynamiques Environnementales - Journal International Des géosciences Et de l’environnement, no. 43-44 (October): 225–43. https://doi.org/10.4000/dynenviron.5234.


Jamoneau, Aurélien, Lise Devreux, Louise Percaille, Audrey Queau, and Vincent Bertrin. 2021. “Influence of historical landscape on aquatic plant diversity.” Journal of Vegetation Science 32 (1): e12839. https://doi.org/10.1111/jvs.12839.


Laplace-Treyture, Christophe, Jonathan Derot, Emilie Prévost, Anne Le Mat, and Aurélien Jamoneau. 2021. “Phytoplankton morpho-functional trait dataset from French water-bodies.” Scientific Data  8 (40): 9 p. https://doi.org/10.1038/s41597-021-00814-0.


Morin, Soizic, Arnaud Chaumot, Olivier Geffard, Adeline François, Aurélien Jamoneau, Gwilherm Jan, Julie Neury-Ormanni, Jacky Vedrenne, and Margot Wagner. 2022. “Dynamiques écologiques temporelles des lacs du littoral aquitain - DYLAQ. Tome 4 : Interactions biologiques et impacts écotoxicologiques.” Research Report. INRAE UR EABX. https://hal.inrae.fr/hal-03602225.


Neury-Ormanni, Julie, Caroline Doose, Nabil Majdi, Jacky Vedrenne, Walter Traunspurger, and Soizic Morin. 2020a. “Selective grazing behaviour of chironomids on microalgae under pesticide pressure.” Science of the Total Environment 730 (August): 138673. https://doi.org/10.1016/j.scitotenv.2020.138673.


———. 2020b. “Does pesticide pressure affect the grazing behaviour of chironomids on microalgae?” In EcotoxicoMic 2020 - Second International Conference on Microbial Ecotoxicology. virtual conference, France. https://hal.science/hal-03136762.


Neury-Ormanni, Julie, Jacky Vedrenne, and Soizic Morin. 2020. “Benthic diatom growth kinetics under combined pressures of microalgal competition, predation and chemical stressors.” Science of the Total Environment 734 (September): 139484. https://doi.org/10.1016/j.scitotenv.2020.139484.


Neury-Ormanni, Julie, Jacky Vedrenne, Margot Wagner, Gwilherm Jan, and Soizic Morin. 2020. “Micro-meiofauna morphofunctional traits linked to trophic activity.” Hydrobiologia 847 (12): 2725–36. https://doi.org/10.1007/s10750-019-04120-0.


Ribaudo, Cristina, Pierre Anschutz, Florent Arthaud, Pascal Bartout, Vincent Bertrin, G. Bourguetou, Yohana Cabaret, et al. 2021. Les plans d’eau face aux changements climatiques. Cahier Thématique n1. Acclimaterra. https://hal.inrae.fr/hal-03484549.


Ribaudo, Cristina, and Vincent Bertrin. 2022. “Les plans d’eau, des alliés face au changement climatique.” In Salon Plan Climat. Parentis-en-Born, France: Communauté de Communes des Grands Lacs. https://hal.inrae.fr/hal-04016128.


Rocha, Barbbara Silva, Maxime Logez, Aurélien Jamoneau, and Christine Argillier. 2023. “Assessing resilience and sensitivity patterns for fish and phytoplankton in French lakes.” Global Ecology and Conservation 43 (April): e02458. https://doi.org/10.1016/j.gecco.2023.e02458.


Vedrenne, Jacky, and Aurélien Jamoneau. 2018. “Biofilm on macrophytes: What about Micro-meiofauna?” La chaîne des lacs et étangs du littoral aquitain. https://hal.inrae.fr/hal-02608504.
